direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the bag based on the presence of elements in a given collection, but with opposite effects (retain vs. remove).
Both methods involve checking the presence of elements from a given collection in the bag, but with different outcomes (modification vs. boolean result).
Both methods involve modifying the bag based on elements, but with different operations (addition vs. retention).
Both methods involve removing elements from the bag, but with different criteria (single element vs. based on another collection).
Both methods involve adding or retaining elements based on a collection, but with different operations (addition vs. retention).
